TextEng: Goodbye.
I am trying.
Your daughter is dead.
Explain what happened.
I have decided to help you.
I want to ask you some questions.
I didn't say I would help you.
Aren't you one of the dwarven race known as the Duergar?
You lie; I know all about Duergar and their evil ways.
Text: 거짓말이에요. 듀에르가와 그들의 사악한 방식에 대해 다 알아요.

TextEng: I am Drogan's pupil and he never mentioned you.
Text: 저는 드로건의 제자인데 당신 얘기는 한 적 없어요.

TextEng: Well, as a matter of fact, I know Drogan well.
You have no need of a name. I am simply passing through.
Text: 이름은 필요 없어요. 그냥 지나가는 중이에요.

TextEng: Recognize a friend by <his/her> face; words can be lies.
Text: 친구는 얼굴로 알아보는 거예요. 말은 거짓일 수 있으니.

TextEng: The people of Hilltop know me as <FirstName>.
I am <FirstName>, a pupil of Drogan's back in Hilltop.
I'll just take what I want off your corpse then.
Text: 그럼 당신 시체에서 원하는 걸 가져갈게요.

TextEng: No trouble, good Master Hurst. I am not here to stay.
Text: 문제없어요, 허스트 어른. 오래 있을 건 아니에요.

TextEng: What is bothering you so greatly?
Have you been bothered by the kobolds too?
Good luck and goodbye.
I just want to ask you some questions.
That's all my questions.
Where is the hill giant's cave?
Why did you mention Chauntea? Isn't she a human goddess?
Text: 왜 차운티아를 언급했어요? 인간 여신 아니에요?

TextEng: What kind of name is Nathan, for a dwarf?
Text: 네이선이 드워프 이름으로는 좀 이상하지 않아요?

TextEng: How did you, a Duergar, come to live on the surface?
Text: 듀에르가인 당신이 어떻게 지상에서 살게 됐어요?

TextEng: I don't care about your troubles.
Tell me more, perhaps I could help.
Text: 더 말해봐요, 도와줄 수 있을지도 몰라요.

TextEng: Forget it. She's probably already been roasted on a spit.
I have my own problems.
Goodbye.
I changed my mind. I will help you.
Is there a reward?
I can help you.
